public class Main {

      while (t-- > 0) {

         for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
            A[i] = sc.nextInt();
         }
         int ans = 0;

            for (int j = 0; j < m; j += x) {

                if (start > end) {
                    ans++;
                    reverse(A, j, x);
                }
                if (A[j + x - 1] - A[j] + 1 != x) {
                    ans = -1;
                    break;
                }
            }
            System.out.println(ans);
         }
      }
   }
}
